TopicTitle: What line in persistent.sfs specifies part damage?

Articles.Content:
expt?

state?

or is part damage, aside from wheels, not persistent?

Thanks for any help.
What do you mean? Are you talking about damage to solar panels?
I had some wing pieces get damaged as shown in the log and now I would like to repair them. Thanks again.
I have no idea, but you could try doing some tests on the runway. Put something down, copy its info, damage the part on purpose, compare.

As far as I know the only 'persistant' damage is stuff breaking entirely. Solar panels and wheels can be repaired if it's only the panel/tire itself and not the mount.

When your log says 'X was damaged by exhaust from Y' it's normally not broken and will continue to function as before.
I don't know if there is a line that specifies part damage, but you could try copying the craft file and pasting it into the persistent file where the craft description originally was.
